element.name: Inferior Prefrontal Gyrus
element.function: Processing of syntax in oral and sign languages

element.name: Insular Cortex
element.notes: Interoception, merges tactile and auditory streams

element.name: Premotor Cortex
element.function: Selection of appropriate motor plans for voluntary movements

element.name: Subgenual Cortex
element.function: Influences changes in appetite and sleep
element.notes: Subdivision of cytoarchitecturally defined cingulate region

element.name: Supplementary Motor Cortex
element.function: Process sequences of movements and coordinate bilateral movements

element.name: Precuneus
element.function: Spatial orientation, Representation of the self

element.name: Inferior Parietal Lobule
element.function: Perception of emotions in facial stimuli and interpretation of sensory information
element.notes: SMG, Represent spoken words, tool use

element.name: Intraparietal Sulcus
element.function: Perceptual-motor coordination and visual attention, eye movements and reaching

element.name: Posterior Cingulate Cortex
element.function: Self-awareness, pain and episodic memory retrieval

element.name: Associative Visual Cortex
element.function: Processing of global motion, dynamic shapes

element.name: Middle Temporal Area
element.function: Integration of local motion signals into global percepts

element.name: Parietooccipital Area
element.function: Analyzing self-motion relative to the environment
element.notes: V6, DM, Dorsomedial Area, Dorsal stream

element.name: Anterior Temporal Lobe
element.function: Relaying blood pressure and blood chemistry information to brain
element.notes: Cortical target of information coming through Hering's nerves, active during panic attacks

element.name: Inferotemporal Area
element.notes: Face recognition, high level visual processing

element.name: Parainsular Area
element.comment: between insula and 41, supplementary auditory cortex, monkey only
element.notes: Major projects to PFC multi-modal associations, auditory to insula

element.name: Perirhinal Cortex
element.function: Associate different visual views of objects and their various nonvisual attributes

element.name: Wernicke's area A4
element.function: Coordinate the activation or deactivation of grammar areas

element.name: Parasubiculum
element.function: Spatial navigation and the integration of head-directional information
element.notes: Major projects to ET, from CA1,AM

element.name: Presubiculum
element.notes: Major projects to ET, from TH.LD

element.name: Retrosubicular Area
element.notes: Part of IT Cortex, from perirhinal to presubiculum

element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Lateral_part_of_basal_amygdaloid_nucleus Lateral part of basal amygdaloid nucleus]
NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Medial_part_of_basal_amygdaloid_nucleus Medial part of basal amygdaloid nucleus]
NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Lateral_central_nucleus_of_the_amygdala Lateral central nucleus of the amygdala]
NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Medial_central_nucleus_of_the_amygdala Medial central nucleus of the amygdala]
NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Bed_nuclei_of_the_stria_terminalis_oval_nucleus Bed nuclei of the stria terminalis oval nucleus]

element.name: Dentate Gyrus
element.function: Distinguishing multiple instances of similar events

element.name: Ventrolateral Cornu Ammonis of Hippocampus
element.function: Representing sequences of episodic memory - long-term

element.name: Dorsolateral Cornu Ammonis of Hippocampus
element.function: Gate controlled by the activity of the supramammillary nucleus to control signal propagation between HC lamines
element.notes: Hippocampus. Receives theta rithm input from Septum Nucleus

element.name: Dorsomedial Cornu Ammonis of Hippocampus
element.function: Representing sequences of episodic memory - short-term

element.name: Ventromedial Cornu Ammonis of Hippocampus
element.function: Mediate dynamic regulation of pattern separation in the dentate gyrus

element.name: Interstitial Anterior Commissural Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Interstitial_nucleus_of_the_posterior_limb_of_the_anterior_commissure Interstitial nucleus of the posterior limb of the anterior commissure]

element.name: Postsubiculum
element.function: Integrate visual landmarks with internal representations of environments
element.notes: as measured by hippocampal place cells, fear conditioning

element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Anterior_nucleus_of_hypothalamus_anterior_part Anterior nucleus of hypothalamus anterior part]
NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Anterior_nucleus_of_hypothalamus_central_part Anterior nucleus of hypothalamus central part]

NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Ventral_nucleus_of_lateral_geniculate_body Ventral nucleus of lateral geniculate body]

element.name: Lateral Mammillary Nucleus
element.function: Generate theta rythm and relay to HC
element.notes: Memory, recognition, spatial awareness, and interpreting the context of events

element.name: Medial Mammillary Nucleus
element.function: Relay for impulses coming from AM and HC
element.notes: Memory, recognition, spatial awareness, and interpreting the context of events

element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Lateral_part_of_medial_mammillary_nucleus Lateral part of medial mammillary nucleus]
NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Medial_part_of_medial_mammillary_nucleus Medial part of medial mammillary nucleus]

NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Medial_nucleus_of_medial_geniculate_body Medial nucleus of medial geniculate body]

NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Nucleus_of_field_H_of_Forel Nucleus of field H of Forel]

element.name: Anterior Nucleus of Thalamus
element.notes: Projects to L4 of presubiculum and receives from postsubiculum, also to CG, RSP; spatial learning and memory; attentional processes; head direction

element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Lateral_part_of_the_parafascicular_thalamic_nucleus Lateral part of the parafascicular thalamic nucleus]

element.name: Lateral Dorsal Nucleus of Thalamus
element.notes: From RSP L5,6 BA17,18, RT, LGN

element.name: Mediodorsal Nucleus of Thalamus
element.function: Attention, planning, organization, abstract thinking, multi-tasking, and active memory

element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Densocellular_part_of_medial_dorsal_nucleus Densocellular part of medial dorsal nucleus]
NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Magnocellular_part_of_medial_dorsal_nucleus Magnocellular part of medial dorsal nucleus]
NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Paralaminar_part_of_medial_dorsal_nucleus Paralaminar part of medial dorsal nucleus]
NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Parvicellular_part_of_medial_dorsal_nucleus Parvicellular part of medial dorsal nucleus]

element.comment: birds-only equivalent of Pulvinar for motion processing

element.name: Reuniens Nucleus of Thalamus
element.function: Gate information between OMPFC and HC dependent upon attentive/arousal states
element.notes: Regulate amount of neural traffic with changes in attentiveness

element.name: Rhomboidal Nucleus of Thalamus
element.function: Communication of information across memory delays to guide memory responses
element.notes: like RE, return projection from PFC to HC, spatial working memory

element.name: Submedial Nucleus of Thalamus
element.notes: Projections from SC Lamina I, trigeminal nucleus to ACC

element.name: Ventral Anterior Nucleus
element.function: Relay BGA.SN, BGA.GPI, FCA.OMPFC, FCA.CG to MCA.PMC, MCA.SMC
